meanings.definition: Mucklest: superlative form of muckle, meaning large or great in size or amount.
meanings.sent1: The mucklest pumpkin at the fair won first prize.
meanings.sent2: She wore the mucklest hat I had ever seen.
meanings.sent3: The mucklest sandwich you've ever seen was as big as a table!
meanings.sent4: His mucklest dream was to travel the world in a hot air balloon.
meanings.sent5: The mucklest tree in the forest towered over all the others.
